title: "Google Says Use Existing EU Laws, Not New Ones to Govern AI"
excerpt: "Google has called on the European Union to use current EU laws to govern the use of artificial intelligence rather than draft new ones and cautioned against a one size fits all regulatory framework because of AI's diverse applications."
